name: Mushroom Island (Buskerud Folk College 19/20)
description:
Prototype of Zelda-like action adventure. Made by students at Buskerud Folk College.

Walk = WASD
Move camera with mouse
Jump = Spacebar
Talk to muhsrooms = Left click
go back in conversation = Right click(may be buggy)
Restart Level 1 = R
Restart Part 2 = T
Interact with door = Spacebar

Have fun :D
